text: Midnight is a 1939 American romantic comedy movie directed by Mitchell Leisen and starring Claudette Colbert, Don Ameche, John Barrymore, Francis Lederer, Mary Astor, Elaine Barrie. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was remade in 1945 as Masquerade in Mexico. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1939 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Mitchell Leisen Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: Midnight (1939 movie)
